review: I'm amazed at how this tiny stick works.  It was easy to install on my TV and It was up and running in just a few minutes.  I use it for all my Amazon Prime video content plus Netflix.  It also supports several other streaming services..
author: Amazon Customer

review: I have had the Stick for less than 24 hours and I am in love! When we bought our TV, we had no hopes or expectations of getting internet at home so we did not invest in a smart one. We finally got internet so now I regretted that decision. Fire Stick took that regret away! I have one other small smart tv and it does not have 1/10 the available apps through the FS. I have downloaded more than I have been able to explore just yet, but so far they all work beautifully.. I can only get 3 mbps high speed so I was concerned about streaming ability. No problems! The Stick has only stopped once so far to buffer and that was only for about 2 seconds. Finally, with my free month trial of Prime, I am comparing their availability of shows and movies to Netflix. I have found quite a few that are not on Netflix and more current seasons than what Netflix offers. I will still likely keep my N but I think I will also sub to P. Overall, I am more than pleased with the value of my purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone!
